Package com.mvp4g.client.event

Interface Summary
EventBus Interface that defines an event bus.
EventBusWithLookup Event bus where events can be fired thanks to their type.
EventFilter<E extends EventBus> This interface can be implemented in order to receive events all events from an EventBus.

Classes that implement this interface are associated with an EventBus class by adding the
filter class literal to the filterClasses list in the EventBus' @Events annotation
EventHandlerInterface<E extends EventBus> Interface that defines an event handler.

This interface provides getter and setter for the event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BaseEventHandler.
Mvp4gLogger Interface that defines a logger used for events logging.
 

Class Summary
BaseEventBus Base implementation of the event bus.
BaseEventBusWithLookUp Abstract implementation of EventBusWithLookup.
BaseEventHandler<E extends EventBus> Default implementation of EventHandlerInterface.

This implementation has an event bus attribute.
You should extend this class to create a presenter.
DefaultMvp4gLogger Default implementation of Mvp4gLogger.
XmlEventHandler Event handler to use when the event bus is defined thanks to an XML file.
